5 Favorite and Least Favorite Activities

Rank your 5 favorite, and least favorite, activities from this list: https://gist.github.com/fool/b0f254ff8c72a5765b6a9138249789d6

I really don't dislike any of these activities. I think the one I would be the most uncomfortable with would be delivering a talk to a bunch of people that I don't know at a conference, but otherwise
I'm good with everything else.

Favorites
  • Debug a customer's build using a programming language and framework that you've never seen before
  • Help train and onboard new support teammates
  • Receive occasional phone calls requesting support from our highest-value customers
  • Create video tutorials to help teach users a specific feature or use case
  • Analyze thousands of support tickets to spot trends to improve our product
Least Favorites
  • Deliver a talk to many people you don't know at a conference or meetup
  • Dig through server logs to troubleshoot a customer's website behavior
  • Find and recruit teammates for the support team
  • Write and maintain documentation for our software and blog posts for our website./li>
  • Engage multiple users at once via chat to answer their questions and troubleshoot problems
